stories.Title: Geoffrey Hinton is concerned about the future of AI
stories.Description: Following his resignation from Google, the acclaimed "Godfather of AI" spoke with The New York Times about the misuse of AI by bad actors and the potential risks.
stories.Tweet: Geoffrey Hinton is concerned about the future of AI 📦 Following his resignation from Google, the acclaimed "Godfather of AI" spoke with The New York Times about the misuse of AI by bad actors and the potential risks. #ai https://www.theverge.com/2023/5/1/23706311/hinton-godfather-of-ai-threats-fears-warnings

stories.Title: Italy welcomes back ChatGPT
stories.Description: OpenAI's chatbot is available again in the country after meeting privacy demands by regulators. The company reassures users of its dedication to protecting their privacy.
stories.Tweet: Italy welcomes back ChatGPT 📦 OpenAI's chatbot is available again in the country after meeting privacy demands by regulators. The company reassures users of its dedication to protecting their privacy. #chatGPT https://apnews.com/article/chatgpt-openai-data-privacy-italy-b9ab3d12f2b2cfe493237fd2b9675e21

stories.Title: Can AI displace supermodels?
stories.Description: Real-life models and workers in the fashion industry are concerned about the use of AI technology to cut costs, stating it will affect their jobs in the long run.
stories.Tweet: Can AI displace supermodels? 📦 Real-life models and workers in the fashion industry are concerned about the use of AI technology to cut costs, stating it will affect their jobs in the long run. #ai https://www.nbcnews.com/business/business-news/ai-models-levis-controversy-backlash-rcna77280

stories.Title: Apple stays behind in the AI race
stories.Description: The company's inability to keep up with the latest features and innovations in a rapidly-changing artificial intelligence market leaves it unprepared to compete with Big Tech rivals.
stories.Tweet: Apple stays behind in the AI race 📦 The company's inability to keep up with the latest features and innovations in a rapidly-changing artificial intelligence market leaves it unprepared to compete with Big Tech rivals. #apple https://arstechnica.com/gadgets/2023/04/report-describes-apples-organizational-dysfunction-and-lack-of-ambition-in-ai/

stories.Title: Meta's ad platform overcharges customers
stories.Description: A glitch caused chaos among businesses using Meta's advertising system, as they were charged more than double what they initially agreed to pay. The company is now offering refunds.
stories.Tweet: Meta's ad platform overcharges customers 📦 A glitch caused chaos among businesses using Meta's advertising system, as they were charged more than double what they initially agreed to pay. The company is now offering refunds. #meta https://www.techtimes.com/articles/290976/20230501/meta-ad-platform-experiences-glitch-causing-ad-campaigns-overspend.htm

stories.Title: Amazon's plans for Alexa
stories.Description: With the aim of creating the world's best personal assistant, the big tech giant is developing a powerful language model to enhance Alexa's capabilities.
stories.Tweet: Amazon's plans for Alexa 📦 With the aim of creating the world's best personal assistant, the big tech giant is developing a powerful language model to enhance Alexa's capabilities. #amazon https://techcrunch.com/2023/04/28/amazon-working-improved-llm-to-power-alexa/

stories.Title: Apple finds a new audience for the Reality Pro
stories.Description: Reports indicate that the company's AR/VR headset is aimed at sports streaming, enabling viewers to get a truly immersive experience.
stories.Tweet: Apple finds a new audience for the Reality Pro 📦 Reports indicate that the company's AR/VR headset is aimed at sports streaming, enabling viewers to get a truly immersive experience. #apple https://www.techtimes.com/articles/290975/20230430/apple-ar-vr-headset-leaning-heavily-sports-featuring-immersive-streaming.htm

stories.Title: Falcon Heavy finally lifts off
stories.Description: SpaceX's famous rocket successfully deployed three satellites on Sunday despite weather delays and a last-minute abort.
stories.Tweet: Falcon Heavy finally lifts off 📦 SpaceX's famous rocket successfully deployed three satellites on Sunday despite weather delays and a last-minute abort. #spaceX https://www.space.com/spacex-falcon-heavy-sixth-mission-launch-viasat-3-americas

stories.Title: Elon Musk revealed details about the Starship test flight
stories.Description: According to SpaceX's CEO, the self-destruct command didn't work immediately, resulting in a 40-second delay before the explosion.
stories.Tweet: Elon Musk revealed details about the Starship test flight 📦 According to SpaceX's CEO, the self-destruct command didn't work immediately, resulting in a 40-second delay before the explosion. #spaceX https://techcrunch.com/2023/05/01/spacexs-starship-didnt-self-destruct-immediately-as-planned-during-test-launch/

stories.Title: Webb Telescope reveals water vapor signal
stories.Description: Potential atmospheric details of a rocky exoplanet were uncovered by NASA's James Webb Space Telescope during its research.
stories.Tweet: Webb Telescope reveals water vapor signal 📦 Potential atmospheric details of a rocky exoplanet were uncovered by NASA's James Webb Space Telescope during its research. #NASA https://www.nasa.gov/feature/goddard/2023/webb-finds-water-vapor-but-from-a-rocky-planet-or-its-star

stories.Title: toddle: A great tool for web apps
stories.Description: Want to build professional web apps without coding? Check out toddle, the no-code platform that's accessible to everyone.

title: Apple can't keep up with rivals, ChatGPT is back in Italy, Geoffrey Hinton shares AI concerns
